title: New: Battles – White Electric (Shabazz Palaces Remix)
body:
**_Glass Drops_** was both a critical and commercial hit when it dropped last year.

Great featuring slots, a constant killer groove and a fuck load of experimentation cemented it as a modern classic, possibly.

**[Battles](http://www.facebook.com/battlestheband)** are following up the LP with a 4 part 12” series of remixes.  **[Kode9](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kode9/112571475426165)** and **[the Alchemist](http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Alchemist/112217595457101)** are both set to feature, with the **[Shabazz Palaces](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/12960-video-shabazz-palaces-black-up/ "Video: Shabazz Palaces – Black Up")** cut of ‘White Electric’ continuing the ball rolling today. In many ways it’s a complete reinvention of the track, in places it completely unrecognizable, yet it’s the subtle surges of original form, combined with the drastic manipulation of sound that give the piece so much life.

Stream it below.
